Text.Name: SysNpcPuppet
Text.Desc: A Vessel that deteriorates in everyday work and cannot be repaired.

Text.Name: SysInfiPuppet
Text.Desc: This Vessel is made of special materials and will not wear out in daily work. It can still be broken if attacked, though.

Text.Name: SysNewYear
Text.Desc: A lucky monster that would bring a whole year of good fortune.

Text.Name: SysNewYear2
Text.Desc: A lucky monster that would bring a whole year of good fortune.

Text.Name: SysCallUp
Text.Desc: Woken up all of a sudden and unable to return to sleep.

Text.Name: SysDreamCantSleep
Text.Desc: Sleep was interrupted for some reason, unable to fall back to sleep for a while.

Text.Name: SysGodPractice
Text.Desc: Meditate to resist and slow down the coming of Heavenly Tribulation.

Text.Name: SysTeacherModifier
Text.Desc: Temporarily staying. Will leave after a while.

Text.Name: SysVistorModifier
Text.Desc: Temporarily staying. Will leave after a while.

Text.Name: SysGodMonsterModifier
Text.Desc: Temporarily staying. Will leave after a while.

Text.Name: SysPracticeDie
Text.Desc: Once the foundation is destroyed, one cannot progress any further in Cultivation no matter how hard they try.

Text.Name: SysEndureHunger
Text.Desc: Having eaten the dried food, one becomes more tolerant to hunger.

Text.Name: Illusion1
Text.Desc: Started hallucinating after eating some strange mushroom. Loves to work very much.

Text.Name: Illusion2
Text.Desc: Started hallucinating after eating some strange mushroom. Loves running very much and needs a lot of entertainment.

Text.Name: Illusion3
Text.Desc: Started hallucinating after eating some strange mushroom. Loves sleeping very much.

Text.Name: Illusion4
Text.Desc: Started hallucinating after eating some strange mushroom. Vision from the eyes appears to be same yet different, as if in a realm of illusions.

Text.Name: NegativeTime
Text.Desc: This kind of life is such a mess. Unwilling to work. [color=#D06508](Disappears when Mood is above 45)[/color]

Text.Name: NegativeTime_Hearten
Text.Desc: Life goes on, let's cheer up and keep going.

Text.Name: Dissatisfaction
Text.Desc: Had enough of this pitiful life...

Text.Name: Sys_JieNanShenyu
Text.Desc: Base consumption increased by 5 times

Text.Name: Sys_JieNanZhenkong
Text.Desc: Lost ability to perform Miracles

Text.Name: Sys_JieNanHuangu
Text.Desc: Every once in a while, your bone will sustain a new damage.

Text.Name: Sys_WorkBroken
Text.Desc: After losing all magic powers, meditate with the outer disciples in hopes of finding inspiration and achieving a breakthrough.

Text.Name: Sys_MasterHelp
Text.Desc: Your master provided Guard for you, increasing your Mental State and keeping it stabilized.

Text.Name: SeeGod
Text.Desc: Having witnessed Ascension with your own eyes, your body and mind are cleansed by the ways of heaven. Cultivation efficiency will double during this period of time.

Text.Name: Sys_Demon
Text.Desc: Demonized for some reason.

Text.Name: Sys_AbsorbGong_5
Text.Desc: This subject has been casted with the spell Exploitation of External Pleasures, and thus become more easily affected by Mood. When in extreme mood (above 160 or below 40), continuously provides Inspiration and Cultivation for the caster.

Text.Name: Sys_AbsorbGong_6
Text.Desc: This subject has been casted with the spell Soul Infection, causing all of its Foundation be converted to Cultivation and fed into the caster every day at 0 AM. It also weakens the character, decreasing its Five Attributes and Overall Work Efficiency.

Text.Name: Sys_ShenXiu_Magic_JingXin
Text.Desc: The mood of this person is calmer now.

Text.Name: Sys_DaoLv
Text.Desc: When together with my companion, I can feel a strong consonance between us, which greatly boosts the efficiency of Cultivation.

Text.Name: Sys_Jianglingfenshen
Text.Desc: The doppelganger of an ancestral master that only serves to fight in battle. It will leave after a while.

Text.Name: Sys_Jianglingjiangdao
Text.Desc: The doppelganger of an ancestral master which is giving a lecture. It will leave after a while.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_ZangMenDebuff
Text.Desc: The Sect Leader is feeling a great deal of stress due to the heavy burden of having to manage the sect, which causes a decrease in cultivation-related stats including Mental State, Cultivation Speed, Inspiration Obtaining Speed and Breakthrough Chance. The more branches the sect has, the heavier the stress. It can be reduced to some extent depending on the Sect Leader's management skills.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_TangZhuDebuff
Text.Desc: The Branch Leader is feeling a great deal of stress due to the heavy burden of having to manage the disciples of the branch, which causes a decrease in cultivation-related stats including Mental State, Cultivation Speed, Inspiration Obtaining Speed and Breakthrough Chance. The more disciples the branch has, the heavier the stress. It can be reduced to some extent depending on the Sect Leader's management skills.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_ZangMenDebuff_Old
Text.Desc: Although no longer the Sect Leader, the heavy stress you have endured when managing the sect is not to be relieved so easily within a short period of time. Decreases Cultivation-related stats including Mental State, Cultivation Speed, Inspiration Obtaining Speed and Breakthrough Chance.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_TangZhuDebuff_Old
Text.Desc: Although no longer the Branch Leader, the heavy stress you have endured managing the branch is not to be relieved so easily within a short period of time. Decreases Cultivation-related stats including Mental State, Cultivation Speed, Inspiration Obtaining Speed and Breakthrough Chance.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_NoAreaBuff
Text.Desc: Due to the inability of Branch Leader, disciples of this branch cannot receive the Area Bonus.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_NoAllBuff
Text.Desc: Due to the inability of Branch Leader, disciples of this branch cannot receive the Normal Bonus.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Nei_Dan
Text.Desc: Inner disciples have increased Pill Concocting speed, success rate and yield within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Wai_Dan
Text.Desc: Outer disciples have improved medicine making and healing abilities within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_All_Dan
Text.Desc: Increases Healing/Alchemy skill level and Perception. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses. (The permanent Expertise Bonuses refresh every 1 day)

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Nei_Qi
Text.Desc: Inner disciples have increased Artifact Crafting speed, success rate, product grade and quality within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Wai_Qi
Text.Desc: Outer disciples have improved crafting abilities within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_All_Qi
Text.Desc: Increases Crafting/Artifact Crafting skill level and Constitution. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses. (The permanent Expertise Bonuses refresh every 1 day)

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Nei_Zhan
Text.Desc: Inner disciples have improved Resilience and Pain Endurance within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Wai_Zhan
Text.Desc: Outer disciples have improved Resilience and Pain Endurance within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_All_Zhan
Text.Desc: Improves combat-related abilities, including Battle Skill level, Perception and Constitution. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses. (The permanent Expertise Bonuses refresh every 1 day)

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Nei_XiuLian
Text.Desc: Inner disciples have increased Mental State, Cultivation Speed, Inspiration Obtainment and Breakthrough Chance within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Wai_XiuLian
Text.Desc: Outer disciples have increased Foundation Training speed within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_All_XiuLian
Text.Desc: Increases Qi Sense level and Intelligence. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses. (The permanent Expertise Bonuses refresh every 1 day)

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Nei_WaiShi
Text.Desc: Inner disciples are granted a general efficiency bonus when within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Wai_WaiShi
Text.Desc: Outer disciples are granted a general efficiency bonus when within the scope of this branch. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_All_WaiShi
Text.Desc: Improves attributes including Adventure Speed, Reputation Obtaining Bonus, Adventure Breakthroughing Speed, Social Skill level, Charisma and Luck. The more able the Branch Leader, the higher the bonuses. (The permanent Expertise Bonuses refresh every 1 day)

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Magic_Prophesy
Text.Desc: When something is about to happen, a hint will be given in advance.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_CanNotExperience
Text.Desc: This disciple has just returned from a long Adventure, and need some time to meditate in order to stabilize their Cultivation.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_TameCD
Text.Desc: This animal has just been fed.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_GodMode
Text.Desc: Invulnerable State

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_Fenshenshang
Text.Desc: Fallen into a state of weakness after performing Spirit Splitting.

Text.Name: SysConcealmentModifier
Text.Desc: Hide presence to lower the chance of being discovered. \nTakes 5 sec to undo hiding.

Text.Name: SysConcealmentRobModifier
Text.Desc: Increased chance of being discovered.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_WinterWarm
Text.Desc: Cold-resistant increased after eating the Winter Worm.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_SummerHerb
Text.Desc: Heat-resistant increased after eating the Summer Herb.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_SuppressGodCall
Text.Desc: Forcibly suppress the Heavenly Tribulation.

Text.Name: Modifier_Sys_CangJingGe
Text.Desc: Thanks to the amount of books in the sect's collection, our disciples can cultivate and obtain Inspiration faster.

Text.Name: SysNewYearZhulong
Text.Desc: The Torch Dragon is watching you, and will leave after a while.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_ColdDown
Text.Desc: Takes some time to fully absorb the nutrition of all the medicines, during which no new nutrition will be gained through eating medicine.
